seg.quote: I had not seen enough of his work.
The fact that he did so much is proof enough.

sense.def:
Kadar za nekaj rečemo, da je
enough
, hočemo povedati, da nočemo, da bi se nadaljevalo ali slabšalo.

seg.quote: I've had enough of the both of you.
Don't tell me. I've got enough problems.
This thing is complicated enough already.

sense.def:
Z besedo
enough
povemo, da ima nekdo ali nekaj potrebno količino kakovosti ali da se nekaj dogaja do potrebne mere.

seg.quote: He was old enough to understand.
The student isn't trying hard enough.

sense.def:
Z izrazi, kot sta
strangely enough
in
interestingly enough
povemo, da je neko dejstvo za nas nenavadno ali zanimivo.

seg.quote: Oddly enough, I do believe you.
